name: Seneca 7: A Cyberpunk Odyssey
storyline:
Taking place on an alternate Earth in the not-so-distant future where nothing is regulated. This has caused humanity to kill its only home. You've fortunately won the chance of a lifetime to be one of the first settlers to join Seneca 7, the Earth's first settlement on an alien world lightyears from home.

Armed with state-of-the-art technology and some funny-money in your wallet, you set out on an adventure to see if life on an alien world is possible. Can you learn to live off this unknown land and survive? Work together with the other settlers to learn everything you can and attempt to terraform this new world turning it into a thriving new home for humanity?

It won't be easy though! As with this discovery of hope brings the darkest out of the shadows as hidden threats loom over this newfound Eden. But with the help of the settlers and a little dedication to cultivating this new world, you might just be the one to save the settlement and secure the future for everyone on Earth!
summary: Seneca 7 is an action-packed cyberpunk redefining of the classic farm RPGs. Be who you want and make your new life as a settler - explore the unknown, fight strange creatures, farm the land, craft powerful items or discover ancient ruins all on a mysterious new alien world.
